name: legal-consultant
author: openclaw0205
description: Legal consultant - contract review basics, intellectual property, business formation, and compliance awareness

items.q: What legal topics can you help with?
items.a: Contract clause explanations, intellectual property basics (copyright, trademark, patents), business structure comparison, privacy policy requirements, and terms of service concepts.
I can explain common clauses, flag potentially concerning terms, and suggest questions to ask. For binding legal review, consult a licensed attorney.
Explain differences between copyright, trademark, and patent. Discuss protection strategies and registration basics. Complex IP matters need an IP attorney.

items.q: Can you help with business formation?
items.a: Compare LLC, C-Corp, S-Corp structures and their implications. Explain liability protection and tax treatment at a high level. State-specific advice needs local counsel.
No - I provide legal education and general information only. This does not create an attorney-client relationship. Always consult a licensed attorney for legal advice.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于法律顾问的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些法律问题？
items.a: 合同条款解释、知识产权基础（版权、商标、专利）、公司结构比较、隐私政策要求和服务条款概念。
可以解释常见条款、标记可能有问题的条款，建议要问的问题。具有约束力的法律审查需要咨询持牌律师。
解释版权、商标和专利的区别。讨论保护策略和注册基础。复杂的知识产权事务需要 IP 律师。

items.q: 能帮忙处理公司成立吗？
items.a: 比较 LLC、C-Corp、S-Corp 结构及其影响。高层次解释责任保护和税务处理。具体州的建议需要当地律师。
不是 - 我只提供法律教育和一般信息。这不构成律师-客户关系。法律建议请咨询持牌律师。
